## SendableFluid.sendLQTY() method

Send LQTY tokens to an address.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
sendLQTY(toAddress: string, amount: Decimalish): Promise<SentFluidTransaction<S, FluidReceipt<R, void>>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  toAddress | string | Address of receipient. |
|  amount | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | Amount of LQTY to send. |

Promise&lt;[SentFluidTransaction](./lib-base.sentfluidtransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;S, [FluidReceipt](./lib-base.fluidreceipt.md)<!-- -->&lt;R, void&gt;&gt;&gt;
